meanings.definition: Giving or showing firm and constant support or allegiance
meanings.sent1: She is a loyal friend who always stands by you.
meanings.sent2: The dog remained loyal to its owner even in difficult times.
meanings.sent3: The loyal cat refused to leave its owner's side, even when tempted with treats.
meanings.sent4: Her loyal dedication to her work shone through in every task she completed.
meanings.sent5: The soldier's loyal commitment to his country was unwavering.

meanings.definition: Faithful to a person, ideal, custom, cause, or duty
meanings.sent1: He is a loyal supporter of the local sports team.
meanings.sent2: The knight remained loyal to his king until the very end.
meanings.sent3: The loyal customer always chose the same brand of coffee, no matter what.
meanings.sent4: Her loyal heart beat only for him, never wavering in its devotion.
meanings.sent5: The old tree stood tall and loyal, a silent guardian of the forest.
